subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Out four and a half weeks with a chest injury, Uribe, who already has two World Series rings, was included as a right-handed bat off the bench and as a backup to David Wright at third base.
snippet: Out four and a half weeks with a chest injury, Uribe, who already has two World Series rings, was included as a right-handed bat off the bench and as a backup to David Wright at third base.
